item.content:encoded:
Irish gaming company Jolt Online [previously known as OMAC] have launched Legends of Zork

30 years after its first conception, Zorkâ„¢ is back!

Dylan Collins, founder and CEO of Jolt had this to say in press release

â€œWeâ€™ve designed LoZ to be as accessible as possible, hoping to appeal to both original Zork fans (and thereâ€™s enough of them working on this that we should know what weâ€™re talking about), while also trying to bring in a whole new generation of playersâ€
